question:
Last month you had a holiday overseas where you stayed with some friends. They have
just sent you some photos of your holiday.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
● thank them for the photos and for the holiday
● explain why you didn’t write earlier
● invite them to come and stay with you
text: I’m writing to let you know that I’ve just received a courier package from the photo album.

I appreciate your efforts and thank you so much for such a remarkable holiday. I spent a good time with all of you. Canada is a beautiful country with snowy mountains, dense forests, and spectacular wildlife. I always remember a scuba diving on Edinburgh beach. I was delighted by your friendly nature.

For a month, I was quite busy with my current project work and unable to contact you. I’m very sorry about this thing. Apart from the busy office schedule, I fall sick and had a severe cold. This forced me to take a few days off from work.

I’d like to invite both of you to visit Portugal. My wife and I plan to celebrate our 20 th marriage anniversary next month. I wish you’ll join us on this occasion. Portugal is a nice place and they’re several places which attract tourist. I’m sure you will enjoy your time in Portugal.
I’d like to see both of you. Take care and be safe.
